A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm a fan of great writing. I'm a fan of Star Wars.. This movie is missing both. Episode VII because it felt like a remake of Episode III but it was better than this.

They blew their only chance to do something great with Luke's character. Instead\, his importance is downplayed and his character is boring. He dies in the most boring way imaginable.

There was too much focus on Leia's character. It took both Anakin and Luke 2-3 movies to become badass Jedis. They had mentors who taught them how to use the force. Rey apparently didn't need training and could have easily bested Luke if she wanted to. Ridiculous. 

I could go on but why bother? The story sucked.

All things considered\, Disney ruined Star Wars.
